description: This file defines a React functional component called Sidebar, which serves as a layout sidebar featuring quick filters, saved views, and recent activities. It includes user interactions for toggling filter types and navigation among saved views, interacting with Redux store slices for state management.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a sidebar with filter controls, saved views, and recent activities. It manages filter toggling and navigation via passed props and Redux.

methods.name: toggleType
methods.description: Toggles the presence of a behavior type in the filters by dispatching setBehaviorTypes with the updated list.
